title: 148862525.doing Curiousity

children.text: Could you image what life would be like if curiosity was ephemeral? If we had a sit around waiting for the ideal conditions to percolate in order to be curious about anything?
How dull would life be? How monotonous?
Fortunately for us, we don't have to feel anything to be interested in something.
To want to learn more about how or why something works.
To look. Or listen. Or ask a question. Or engage.
Because curiosity, thank goodness, is not an emotion, a feeling, or even a state of mind.
If you're bored, apathetic or even despondent, maybe you should try it.
